name: Download, Downloads – WordPress Download plugin By Edmon
author: edmon

sections.description:
The easiest way to download files via wordpress Download plugin.

Download types

  • Link download type
  • Image download type
  • Button download type
  • Subscription download type

usage of digital download manager short code

[ydn_download href=”https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/ydn-download.zip” title=”Donwload title”]

If you think that you have found a bug in Download plugin or have any questions, please feel free to contact us at edmon.parker@gmail.com.
sections.faq:
What files I need to upload for installing the plugin

You need to select the “download ” plugin.zip file, there is no need to extract the zip file, just upload it.
